about_the_game:
A tactical adventure game that plunges you into the shadowy depths of a lost city, now overrun by a malevolent force. Take control of a brave squad of dwarves, led by the valiant former ruler Amos, and venture into uncharted depths to reclaim the city from the grip of darkness, one turn at a time. Ready your pick axes, tighten your boots, and prepare to dive headfirst into the darkness – and don't forget your ale!



Combat in Into The Deep is all about smart decisions and bold tactics. Plan each move carefully, position your squad wisely, and execute strategies that leave your enemies in shambles (and possibly leave your dwarves with a few new scars). It’s a game of brains, brawn, and a lot of beards.



Tactics alone aren’t enough – you’ll need precision and quick thinking to pull off some of the more advanced moves. In this turn-based game, positioning is just half the battle. The other half is how well you can aim that dwarven rifle, set up a perfect chain reaction, or bounce a shot just right to hit enemies where they least expect it.



Descend into a labyrinth of forgotten alleys, haunted ruins, and treacherous tunnels. Every path you choose reveals secrets, challenges, and the occasional nasty surprise that’s been waiting far too long for company. Whether you're uncovering lost lore or looting ancient vaults, there’s always something worth discovering – if you can survive long enough to find it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Into the Deep is a tactical adventure RPG where you lead a troop of dwarves through a lost city. Plan turn-based battles, recruit survivors, explore catacombs, solve puzzles, and defeat dark forces to save the city.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
